attributes.action: Stop our children being invited to Gamble
attributes.additional_details:
Every day we are being bombarded by advertisements  from Bingo and online Casino sites offering the next amazing deal.  Deposit £10 get £35 to play, with new and fantastic slots. Many of these sites are sponsoring day time and early evening television where young and impressionable children are watching.

All these are in breach of the Gambling Act 2005, where the code clearly states and I quote.

"A person commits an offence if he invites, causes or permits a child or young person to gamble."

View for yourself at the official website in particular subsection 3b

http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2005/19/section/46

All advertisement prior to 9pm regarding gambling is in breach of this Legislation.

Please sign this petition and add it to your Facebook page.  Lets protect our children, we were once with the 1968 Gaming Act that prevented Advertisements.
